About Us:
“30cm games”is a newly established Taiwan-based game development team. All of us love to make games which can satisfy player’s requirement and inspire players' desire. Hope you can support local developing teams. Your support is our great motivation.

Description of adult content:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content.
It contains content that is not for all ages, such as partial nudity, sexual themes, and intense language.
All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 64 bit or newer
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 800 equivalent or greater
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 950 equivalent or greater

short_description: "Witch of Mystery Tower" is a witch x gem elimination x interactive erotic game. It’s a turn-based game that you need to fight against witches by eliminating magical gems. As the witch's magical value decays until she is unable to battle with the player, it starts the interactive erotic stage.
supported_languages: Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, English, Russian, Korean
